subdisciplines.name: Clinical Neuropsychology
subdisciplines.description: The study and assessment of cognitive, behavioral, and emotional effects of brain injuries and illness.

subdisciplines.name: Forensic Psychology
subdisciplines.description: The application of psychology to legal and criminal justice systems. Forensic psychologists may be involved in profiling, jury selection, and evaluating criminal defendants.

subdisciplines.name: Health Psychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how psychological, social, and behavioral factors influence physical health and well-being.

subdisciplines.name: Child and Adolescent Psychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of psychological disorders and treatment of children and adolescents.
